title: (x) TW Food Restaurant neutral sans - Akkurat {Charles Grant}
content:
Could anyone identify this font (the display font)? It looks so lovely and fresh...  
Thank you geniuses.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905135944im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/homeleft1_5701.gif)

 [‹ Have any of these faces got digital versions yet?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905135944/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40202 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Bureau of Communication typeface - Gotham {Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905135944/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40237 "Go to next forum topic")
author: izzyce
